name: Fireflighter
description:
Fireflighter is a game about fighting forest fires, what may sometimes feel like a lost battle. We developed it based on the archetype "Man in midst of struggle, urging to continue", as that was our interpretation of the theme "It's been a long time, but we're not done yet".

Trailer: 

We hope you will enjoy! :)

Fireflighter was developed for the Epic Mega Jam 2020 by:

Josh Trevisiol: Art & Programming

Chris Fauver: Programming & Art

Brantley Curry: Voice Actor

Matthew Sbar: Music

Various SFX: From Sonniss free game dev bundles

Assets we sourced/had on hand already: 
Aircraft: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/simple-aircraft-74613c5da1f647a9b485126dbffedfed

Camping Deco: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/cartoon-camping-kit-6baeb91fa58549e29f839a7e72fc...

More Camping Deco: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/camping-pack-d6b274f1760d46d8b8bb8045f93ab12c

Base flight system:  https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/aerocomp

Voxel Plugin Pro: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/voxel-plugin-pro

Grass and Trees were made by Josh back in 2016.

UI button Icons were made by Josh back in 2017.

All other assets scene composition, and gameplay features were made by Josh & Chris during the jam.
